descriptionHtml:
Hey guys, just another small mod that I've been working on. What it is? This mod is simply a retexture of the vanilla Dark Brotherhood armor found in the base game. I've also added some armored plates to make it stand out a bit more. It is found when you would normally receive your DB armor and carries the same enchantments.

Permissions: If you want to use this mod in your work, go ahead and just let me know and give me some credit forÂ the original work.

Credits:

Bethesda
Blender 2.49b
PS
NifSkope
modder's

Thanx and enjoy! :)
author: Scroll Thief
